column5: Hi am after any info you folk could pass onto a visiting tourist from Australia. Am heading up next week to dark lake for a week , I have sum basic gear with a small boat ( no sounder ) couple years ago I managed two small trout and sum small bass . Any techniques I should try at this time year , depths for fish etc . Got few small bass casting weedless to shore line last time . Trout trolling sum deep minows 15 ft.Â Thanks for any advice
